welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lovejoy, where the charm of small-town America meets the excitement of a bustling city. Get ready to experience our quaint shops, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals as you explore all that Lovejoy has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves international flights and offers customs and immigration services.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves domestic and international flights and is connected to the main terminal by a shuttle train.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves domestic and international flights and is connected to the main terminal by a shuttle train.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fulton County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and their passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
